mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_IMPORT_SUPPLIER
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_TYPE = #{supplierType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESR_NAME = #{chinesrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_PRODUCT = #{majorProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BYPRODUCT = #{byproduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCER_NAME = #{producerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CIVIL_ACHIEVEMENT = #{civilAchievement,jdbcType=CLOB},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=CLOB},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_IMPORT_SUPPLIER set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_TYPE = #{supplierType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESR_NAME = #{chinesrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR_PRODUCT = #{majorProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYPRODUCT = #{byproduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCER_NAME = #{producerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
,
from T_SES_SMS_IMPORT_SUPPLIER where 1=1
and NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
and SUPPLIER_TYPE= #{supplierType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and status= #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
select ID from T_SES_SMS_IMPORT_SUPPLIER t1 where t1.LOGIN_NAME=#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
